basic.description: This course provides an in-depth examination of the epidemiology of physical activity, fitness and health. The course builds upon basic epidemiological methods and explores the relationship between physical activity and several health outcomes, including coronary heart disease, stroke, metabolic syndrome, type 2 diabetes and cancer.
basic.subject: HLTH
basic.title: Epidemiology of Physical Activity, Fitness and Health

extra.enrollment_requirement:
PREREQUISITE    HLTH 323/3.0 & registration in a HLTH, KINE or PHED plan.
EXCLUSION    No more than 3.0 units from HLTH 325/3.0; KNPE 255/3.0 (formerly PHED 255/3.0)
